apache:
mand <<- c("Base","PERF")
bj:
mand <<- c("Base","PERF","Persistence","IO","LogSize","Checksum","BTreeFeatures","IEvictor","Evictor","Critical_Eviction")
llvm:
mand <<- c("time_passes","PERF")
sql
mand <<- c("PageSize","PERF","LockingMode","SetCacheSize","SetAutoVacuum","Options","OmitFeatures","DisableFeatures","EnableFeatures","OperatingSystemCharacteristics")
x264
mand <<- c("no_asm","PERF","rc_lookahead","ref")
bc
mand <<- c("PAGESIZE","PERF","CACHESIZE")
